# E-Commerce Mega Menu Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview

This is a React + Vite + Tailwind CSS project demonstrating Z-Index and Absolute Positioning concepts in a modern e-commerce mega menu layout.

## Key Features

- Navigation bar with hover-triggered mega menu
- Mega menu uses absolute positioning to float over content
- Demonstrates proper z-index stacking for layered UI elements

## Development Workflow

1. Run `npm install` to install dependencies
2. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
3. Open `http://localhost:5173` in your browser

## Important Notes

- The mega menu uses `absolute` positioning to prevent layout shift
- Z-index values are set on the navbar (`z-50`) to ensure proper layering
- Tailwind CSS is configured for styling all components
